title: Journey in France
creator_credit: Gunther V. Fritsch and Churchill-Wexler Film Productions
brief_description: A picture of France seen through the eyes of the two daughters of a barge family as they travel the rivers and canals from Marseilles to Strasbourg. Presents a panorama of the history, geography, and economy of the country, and portrays the character of the French working people.
creator_credit_for_label: Gunther V. Fritsch and Churchill-Wexler Film Productions
